title: How Arsenal are looking to improve their atmosphere

title: 'There were promising signs' - Brook after New Zealand defeat

title: Cops alerted by AI gun detection system arrest high school student holding bag of Doritos â€” eight cars sent to disarm chip-toting teen

summary: First came the astonishing NRL Grand Final performance, then the starring display on his Australia debut against England. October has been Reece Walsh's month - will November bring more accolades?

title: England slide to defeat as batting woes continue
summary: England collapse again as they slide to a five-wicket defeat by New Zealand, who seal victory in the one-day international series with a match to spare.

summary: With New Zealand heading north for November clashes with Ireland, England, Scotland and Wales, BBC Sport NI takes a look at their current form.
